theShade:PlaceholderRelic2.NAME: Twisted Sorcery
theShade:PlaceholderRelic2.FLAVOR: The influence of the Dark Ones can be an addicting source of power.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn, gain #b1 #ytheshade:Corruption.

theShade:FifthShadow.NAME: Fifth Shadow
theShade:FifthShadow.FLAVOR: Better sew it to your shoes this time.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of turn 5, gain #yIntangible.

theShade:WiltingRose.NAME: Wilting Rose
theShade:WiltingRose.FLAVOR: Typical Rose, always meddling with eldritch horrors.
DESCRIPTIONS: Applying #ytheshade:Wither to enemies also makes them #yWeak.

theShade:HellfireTalisman.NAME: Hellfire Talisman
theShade:HellfireTalisman.FLAVOR: Say what you want about demons, but they sure know how to burn things.
DESCRIPTIONS: Applying #ytheshade:Burning to enemies also makes them #yVulnerable.

theShade:BurningTome.NAME: Burning Tome
theShade:BurningTome.FLAVOR: Burns your hand when held. This tome actually has little to say about fire magic.
DESCRIPTIONS: Draw 1 additional card each turn. At the start of combat, gain 3 #ytheshade:Burning.

theShade:CursedTome.NAME: Cursed Tome
theShade:CursedTome.FLAVOR: The fatigue is just from carrying around such a heavy tome.
DESCRIPTIONS: Draw 1 additional card each turn. At the start of combat, add a #ytheshade:Fatigue to your hand.

theShade:TitanTome.NAME: Titan Tome
DESCRIPTIONS: Draw 1 additional card each turn. At the start of each of their turns after turn 7, all enemies heal for 50 HP.

theShade:DefaultClickableRelic.NAME: Right-Clicky Relic
theShade:DefaultClickableRelic.FLAVOR: The more you right-click it, the more orbs you've evoked in your lifetime.

theShade:BottledPlaceholderRelic.NAME: Bottled Placeholder
DESCRIPTIONS: Choose a card. Whenever you take play any card, draw the chosen card.
Whenever you play a card, draw
Select a card to bottle for
